WorkItem.Description:
Hi - I am trying to get Wabbitemu running on a Macbook (32 bit platform) - running 10.6.8. 
When I try to start it, I get a message that it is not supported on this type of Mac. 
Do I need a later version Macbook? 
Thank you for your help. 
(Have Wabbitemu on a PC laptop - need to move onto a Mac. Wabbitemu is awesome - I teach Math and it truly helps!.)
WorkItem.Summary: Wabbitemu on Macbook 10.6 - does not start

Comments.Message:
Hello,

Quick disclaimer, I'm not a Mac person and I don't have much knowledge about some of the detail of programming on them. From the sound of it, I would guess that the version of Wabbitemu for the Mac I uploaded is 64 bit only. I've built a version that I believe should be good for both 32-bit and 64 bit. I've tested it, it definitely works on 10.6.8, but I don't have access to a 32 bit Mac. Can you download it from [http://buckeyedude.zapto.org/Revsoft/Wabbitemu/Beta/WabbitEmu.zip](http://buckeyedude.zapto.org/Revsoft/Wabbitemu/Beta/WabbitEmu.zip) and tell me if that works for you?

BuckeyeDude

Hi BuckeyeDude - Thank you!!  (I'm on a different Macbook right now - also running 10.6.8. )
I just downloaded the file - and I am up and running !!!
I will try the other Macbook later and see if it also works there. (That one is the first version of Macbook.)

I cannot say Thank you! enough! for the great tool - and for saving me from buying a Windows system just so I may run it.

vmf152k
